00026 #ifndef __SDLTexture_H__
00027 #define __SDLTexture_H__
00028 
00029 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
00030 #include "OgreTexture.h"
00031 
00032 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == PLATFORM_WIN32
00033 #   include "gl.h"
00034 #   define GL_GLEXT_PROTOTYPES
00035 #   include "glprocs.h"
00036 #else
00037 #   include <GL/gl.h>
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include <GL/glu.h>
00041 
00042 namespace Ogre {
00043 
00044     class SDLTexture : public Texture
00045     {
00046     public:
00047         // Constructor, called from SDLTextureManager
00048         SDLTexture( String name );
00049         virtual ~SDLTexture();        
00050         
00051         void load();
00052         void loadImage( const Image &img );
00053 
00054         void unload();
00055 
00056         void blitToTexture( const Image& src, 
00057             unsigned uStartX, unsigned uStartY );
00058 
00059         GLuint getGLID() const
00060         {
00061             return mTextureID;
00062         }
00063 
00064     protected:
00065         void generateMipMaps( uchar *data );
00066 
00067     private:
00068         GLuint mTextureID;
00069     };
00070 }
00071 
00072 #endif
